item.title: Body found in search for missing girl, 15
item.description: Grace Keeling, 15, was swept into the sea at Withernsea along with her mother Sarah on 2 January.

item.title: Machado vows to lead Venezuela 'when right time comes'
item.description: The opposition leader says she has a mandate to lead the country after the US seized its president.

item.title: Hospital violated trans complaint nurses' dignity, tribunal rules
item.description: A judge says the hospital chiefs' changing room policy created a "hostile" environment for women.

item.title: Former Man Utd players' comments 'irrelevant' - Carrick
item.description: Michael Carrick brands the noise generated around Manchester United by former players "irrelevant" and says Roy Keane's personal comments did not both...

item.title: US lawmakers visit Denmark in bid calm tensions as Trump ups Greenland pressure
item.description: The visit comes after high-level talks in Washington failed to dissuade Trump from his plan to annex the semi-autonomous Danish territory.
